heisig_chinese_memo: This fog is the perfect weather for us to perform our task undetected. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: fog, rain, weather, task, halberd, beforehand, taskmaster, power, muscle, arnold
koohiiStory1: This fog is the perfect weather for us to perform our task undetected.
koohiiStory2: FOG is easy to associate with the RAIN primitive. So think of FOG as a type of RAIN that is slow at the TASK of getting the place wet.
WaniKani_Radicals: 雨, 矛, 夂, 力
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: It's raining on your spear that has winter power. When the warm rain hits your cold, winter spear, it creates fog.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: When warm water touches a cold spear, fog billows out and covers everything.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Through the fog you see the shape of a mythical kirin (きり). You can only see the outline through the fog, but you know it's there.
WaniKani_Reading_Info:
You walk toward the kirin through the fog. When you get close, the image before you becomes clear: it's two cans of Kirin beer on a slide.
Next time you see fog, keep your eyes peeled for the real kirin in the kiri.

Ru_Radicals: 力 (сила), 夂 (зима), 矛 (копьё), 雨 (дождь)

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Fog is a weather condition which makes a normal task a harder one.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Rain ", " Service " sound, original meaning as fog, that is when the temperature drops, the air condenses into water vapor suspended in the air close to the ground, the water droplets blurred vision. "Guanzi·Dudi": "Wind, fog, hail, frost, all harm." Liang Qiuchi of the Southern Dynasty (Danfa Yuputan): "The fog in the fishing pond has not opened, but the wind in Chiting has risen." Like fog. Small water droplets are also called " fog ", as in modern Chinese "spray", which means it.

" Fog " can be compared to the state of lightness. "Selected Works‧Song Yu "Goddess Fu"": "Move the fog with a slow step, and brush the shanshan with the sound of the chicks." Li Shan's note: "Xuan, today's light gauze is as thin as fog." For example, "Zixu Fu": "Then Zheng Nv Manji, was slapped by Azhao, slapped with stubble, mixed with silk, hanging down in the mist." Liu Liang's note: "The mist is as thin as mist, and the clothes hang down. "

" Fog " can also be compared to dense and lush. Emperor Liang Jianwen of the Southern Dynasties "Ode to the Southern Suburbs": "Set up the palace with stars, and the heavy palace fogs out.
humanum_short_description_en: From the " rain ", " Service " sound, the original meaning was fog.
humanum_full_description:
從「雨」，「務」聲，本義為霧氣，即氣溫下降時，空氣中水蒸氣凝結成懸浮在接近地面的空氣中，使視野模糊不清的水滴。《管子‧度地》：「風、霧、雹、霜，一害也。」南朝梁丘遲〈旦發漁浦潭〉：「漁潭霧未開，赤亭風已颺。」如霧氣一般的小水滴也稱為「霧」，如現代漢語的「噴霧」，即用此義。

　　「霧」可比喻輕細之態。《文選‧宋玉〈神女賦〉》：「動霧縠以徐步兮，拂墀聲之珊珊。」李善注：「縠，今之輕紗薄如霧也。」《文選‧司馬相如〈子虛賦〉》：「於是鄭女曼姬，被阿緆，揄紵縞，雜纖羅，垂霧縠。」劉良注：「霧縠，其細如霧，垂之為裳也。」

　　「霧」還可比喻濃密、茂盛之狀。南朝梁簡文帝〈南郊頌〉：「架殿星羅，重宮霧出。」

霧(きり): fog, mist

從「 雨 」，「 務 」聲，本義為霧氣，即氣溫下降時，空氣中水蒸氣凝結成懸浮在接近地面的空氣中，使視野模糊不清的水滴。《管子‧度地》：「風、霧、雹、霜，一害也。」南朝梁丘遲〈旦發漁浦潭〉：「漁潭霧未開，赤亭風已颺。」如霧氣一般的小水滴也稱為「 霧 」，如現代漢語的「噴霧」，即用此義。 「 霧 」可比喻輕細之態。《文選‧宋玉〈神女賦〉》：「動霧縠以徐步兮，拂墀聲之珊珊。」李善注：「縠，今之輕紗薄如霧也。」《文選‧司馬相如〈子虛賦〉》：「於是鄭女曼姬，被阿緆，揄紵縞，雜纖羅，垂霧縠。」劉良注：「霧縠，其細如霧，垂之為裳也。」 「 霧 」還可比喻濃密、茂盛之狀。南朝梁簡文帝〈南郊頌〉：「架殿星羅，重宮霧出。」
From " Rain", " Service" sound, original meaning as fog, that is when the temperature drops, the air condenses into water vapor suspended in the air close to the ground, the water droplets blurred vision. "Guanzi·Dudi": "Wind, fog, hail, frost, all harm." Liang Qiuchi of the Southern Dynasty (Danfa Yuputan): "The fog in the fishing pond has not opened, but the wind in Chiting has risen." Like fog. Small water droplets are also called " fog", as in modern Chinese "spray", which means it. " Fog" can be compared to the state of lightness. "Selected Works‧Song Yu "Goddess Fu"": "Move the fog with a slow step, and brush the shanshan with the sound of the chicks." Li Shan's note: "Xuan, today's light gauze is as thin as fog." For example, "Zixu Fu": "Then Zheng Nv Manji, was slapped by Azhao, slapped with stubble, mixed with silk, hanging down in the mist." Liu Liang's note: "The mist is as thin as mist, and the clothes hang down. " " Fog" can also be compared to dense and lush. Emperor Liang Jianwen of the Southern Dynasties "Ode to the Southern Suburbs": "Set up the palace with stars, and the heavy palace fogs out.

霧字的基本解释

霧
wù
见“雾”。

霧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wù］
［《廣韻》亡遇切，去遇，微。］
“雾1”的繁体字。亦作“雺1”。亦作“霚1”。亦作“霿1”。
(1)雾气。气温下降时，空气中的水蒸气凝结成小水点，悬浮在接近地面的空气中，能使视野模糊不清。
(2)雾气极易消失，故亦引申谓消散。
(3)云气。
(4)比喻轻细之物。
(5)喻浓密、盛多。
(6)雾状的许多小水滴。
(7)通“騖”。飞翔。
[②]［méng］
［《集韻》謨蓬切，平東，明。］
“雾2”的繁体字。亦作“霿2”。
昏暗。

霧字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霧； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1377第36
【廣韻】【韻會】?亡遇切，音務。【爾雅·釋天】地氣發，天不應，曰霧。霧謂之晦。【註】言晦冥。【釋名】霧，冒也，氣蒙亂覆冒物也。【廣韻】元命包曰：隂陽亂爲霧。【禮·月令】氛霧冥冥。【玉篇】本作霿。【廣韻】同霚。【集韻】同雺。　又【集韻】謨蓬切，音蒙。又蒙弄切，音幪。又莫鳳切，音夢。義?同。

霧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
霧字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wù］
["Guangyun" death meets cutting, going to meet, micro. ]
Traditional characters for "雾1". Also known as "Zhu 1". Also known as "Ji 1". Also known as "霿1".
(1) Fog. When the temperature drops, the water vapor in the air condenses into small water spots, which are suspended in the air close to the ground, which can blur the vision.
(2) The mist is easy to disappear, so it is also extended to dissipate.
(3) Yunqi.
(4) It is a metaphor for something light and subtle.
(5) Yu dense and abundant.
(6) Many small droplets of mist.
(7) Through "骛". fly.
[②]［méng］
["Jiyun" Mo Pengqie, Pingdong, Ming. ]
Traditional characters for "Fog 2". Also known as "霿2".
Dim.

[Guang Yun] Same as Ji. 【Jiyun】Same as Yue.　[Jiyun] Mopengqie, sound Meng. Meng Nong cut again, Yin Yi. Mo Fengqie again, Yinmeng. Righteous? Same.

Name meaning

wù
вм. 雾
Radicals: 雨, 矛, 夂, 力  (rain, spear, winter, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
It's raining on your spear that has winter power. When the warm rain hits your cold, winter spear, it creates fog.
When warm water touches a cold spear, fog billows out and covers everything.
Reading Mnemonic
Through the fog you see the shape of a mythical kirin (きり). You can only see the outline through the fog, but you know it's there.
You walk toward the kirin through the fog. When you get close, the image before you becomes clear: it's two cans of Kirin beer on a slide.
Next time you see fog, keep your eyes peeled for the real kirin in the kiri.
